subject: $500 Dining or Shopping Gift Card for shoppersavingsenter.net@speedy.uwaterloo.ca (participation required)
body:
Dear Preferred Member, 

You have been selected to receive a $500 Gift Card for clothes, dinners out, 
a new laptop or cell phone. (Participation required. See below for details.) 
Fill your stomach or your shopping cart, all without emptying your wallet. 

*** Simply follow the instructions on our website, before this notice expires! 
http://rustypromdress.com/c/891081/opytzwx27:fzomttqstVCKarpoqqv00XCKasquxv6 


Sincerely, 
Rewards Team 

 

To unsubscribe from future advertisements from ShoppingSpreeOnUs.net, 
go to: http://rustypromdress.com/n/?27112::167388

Inner Concepts, Inc | 297 Kingsbury Grade #D | PO Box 4470 | Stateline, NV 89449-4470

To receive the incentive gift you must: 1) register with valid information; 2) complete 
the user survey; 3) complete at least 2 Silver, 2 Gold and 2 Platinum offers; and 4) 
refer 1 unique household(s) that also complete these requirements. Purchase may be required. 
Please read website Terms & Conditions for details. Upon completion of all requirements, 
we will ship the incentive gift to you with free shipping.

ShoppingSpreeOnUs.net is an independent rewards program for consumers and is not affiliated 
with, sponsored by or endorsed by any of the listed products or retailers. Trademarks, service 
marks, logos, and/or domain names (including, without limitation, the individual names of 
products and retailers) are the property of their respective owners.  

Copyright 2007 ShoppingSpreeOnUs.net. All rights reserved. 




No longer wish to be on this list, just send a reply email.



Please send comments and inquiries to
RustyPromDress, 364 East Main Street, #302
Middletown, DE 19709

Copyright 2007 RustyPromDress.com
